00013 inline int isarg(int argc, char** argv, const char* required)
00014 {
00015     for(int i = 0; i < argc; i++)
00016         if(strcmp(argv[i], required) == 0)
00017             return i;
00018 
00019     return -1;
00020 }
00021 
00022 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00023 {
00024     using namespace boost::posix_time;
00025     using namespace boost::filesystem;
00026 
00027     #ifndef THEBALL_COMPILE_DEBUG
00028     ofstream log("theball.log");
00029     streambuf* defaultCout = cout.rdbuf();
00030     cout.rdbuf(log.rdbuf());
00031     #endif
00032 
00033     try
00034     {
00035         cout
00036                 #ifdef THEBALL_COMPILE_DEBUG
00037                 << "theBall (" << __DATE__ << ") Debug run" << endl
00038                 #else
00039                 << "theBall (" << __DATE__ << ") Release run" << endl
00040                 #endif
00041                 << endl
00042                 << second_clock::local_time() << endl
00043                 << current_path() << endl
00044                 << endl;
00045 
00046         AppManager theBall;
00047 
00048         int index = -1;
00049 
00050         if((index = isarg(argc, argv, "nomusic")) != -1)
00051             theBall.globalSettings.nomusic = true;
00052 
00053         if((index = isarg(argc, argv, "noaudio")) != -1)
00054             theBall.globalSettings.noaudio = true;
00055 
00056         if((index = isarg(argc, argv, "play")) != -1)
00057         {
00058             // NOTE play <level> <player> <playerCount> <playMod> <playtime>
00059 
00060             Settings::PartySetting ps;
00061             ps.playMap = Settings::MapInfo(argv[index + 1]);
00062             ps.playerName = Settings::PlayerInfo(argv[index + 2]);
00063             ps.playerCount = tools::StrToNum<unsigned>(argv[index + 3]);
00064             ps.playMod = tools::StrToNum<unsigned> (argv[index + 4]);
00065             ps.playTime = tools::StrToNum<int>(argv[index + 5]);
00066 
00067             theBall.ExecuteGame(ps);
00068         }
00069 
00070         else if((index = isarg(argc, argv, "edit")) != -1)
00071         {
00072             // NOTE edit <level>
00073 
00074             Settings::EditSetting es;
00075             es.editMap = Settings::MapInfo(argv[index + 1]);
00076             es.createNew = false;
00077 
00078             theBall.ExecuteEditor(es);
00079         }
00080 
00081         else
00082         {
00083             theBall.ExecuteMenu();
00084         }
00085 
00086     }
00087 
00088     catch(std::exception& e)
00089     {
00090         #ifdef COMPILE_FOR_WINDOWS
00091         MessageBox(0, e.what(), "Fatal error", MB_ICONERROR);
00092         #endif
00093         cout << e.what() << endl;
00094     }
00095 
00096     catch(...)
00097     {
00098         cout << "Unhandled exception catch" << endl;
00099     }
00100 
00101     cout << "Exit success :)" << endl;
00102
